00041 
00042 // Represents the value of IE_DEVICE_N.
00043 //
00044 // This constant is copied from the impulse.h header file.  It is provided
00045 // for convenience, so that one does not need the Impulse SDK installed to
00046 // build software with Device3.
00047 //
00048 // Be warned: if the value IE_DEVICE_N in impulse.h is changed, so must this.
00049 const unsigned int kImm_IE_DEVICE_N = 3;
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 /***************************************************************************/
00054 //
00055 //  Structure Definitions
00056 //
00057 /***************************************************************************/
00058 
00059 // Cartesian Coordinates
00060 typedef struct {
00061     double x;
00062     double y;
00063     double z;
00064 } ImmCoord3;    // inches
00065 
00066 
00070 typedef double  ImmRot3[3][3];
00071 
00072 
00073 // Device Type flags
00074 typedef enum
00075 {
00076     DEVICE_IE2000               = 0x0200,   // The Impulse Engine 2000
00077     DEVICE_FORCEPAD             = 0x0202,   // The ForcePad
00078     
00079     DEVICE_3GM                  = 0x0300,   // Brushed Motor 3GM Mechanism w/o IR
00080     DEVICE_3GM_BRUSHLESS        = 0x0301,   // Brushless Motor 3GM Mechanism w/o IR
00081     DEVICE_3GM_IR               = 0x0302,   // Brushed Motor 3GM Mechanism w/ IR
00082     DEVICE_3GM_BRUSHLESS_IR     = 0x0303,   // Brushless Motor 3GM Mechanism w/ IR
00083 
00084     DEVICE_LAPIE                = 0x0400    // The Laproscopic Impulse Engine
00085 } ImmDeviceType;
00086 
00087 
00088 // Return Values
00089 typedef enum
00090 {
00091 // Success
00092     RESULT_OK                   = 0,
00093 
00094 // Failure (<0)
00095     RESULT_FAILURE              = -1,
00096     RESULT_NOT_IMPLEMENTED      = -3,
00097 
00098 // Abnormal operation (>0)
00099     RESULT_OVERFLOW             = 1,
00100 } ImmResult;
00101 
00102

00123 class DLL_SYMBOL ImmDevice3
00124 {
00125     public:
00137         virtual  char * GetDeviceName( void )    const     = 0;
00138 
00150         virtual  char * GetInterfaceName( void ) const     = 0;
00151 
00166         virtual  char * GetUniqueID( void )      const     = 0;
00167 
00181         virtual  int Calibrate( void ) = 0;
00182 
00195         virtual  int Update( void )    = 0;
00196 
00197 
00219         virtual  int        GetPosition( ImmCoord3 *thePosition )       = 0;
00220 
00242         virtual  int        GetVelocity( ImmCoord3 *theVelocity )       = 0;
00243         
00265         virtual  int        GetOrientation( ImmRot3 *theOrientation )   = 0;
00266     
00283         virtual  int        SetForce( const ImmCoord3 *theForce )       = 0;
00284 
00285         
00302         virtual  int        GetDigitalInputs( long* inputs )            = 0;
00303 
00318         virtual  int        SetDigitalOutputs( long outputs )           = 0;
00319 
00336         virtual  int        GetGrippers( double* grippers )             = 0;
00337 
00353         virtual  int        SetGraspMinMax( int min, int max)           = 0;
00354 
00368         virtual  int        SetToolLength( double length)               = 0;
00382         virtual  int        GetStatus( long* status )                   = 0;
00383 
00394         virtual  bool       GetIsSuspended( void )                      = 0;
00395 
00396     protected:
00397 
00398         // The constructor/destructor/initializer are protected because you have
00399         // to create IDevice3's with a IDevice3Factory
00400         ImmDevice3();
00401 
00402         virtual      ~ImmDevice3();
00403 
00404         virtual bool _Initialized( void )   = 0;    
00405 
00406 };
